body:
The simulation has not run correctly because of this severe error:
** Severe ** Weather Simulation requested, but no weather file attached. The simulation has not run correctly because of this severe error:
** Severe ** Weather Simulation requested, but no weather file attached. The simulation has not run correctly because of this severe error:
** Severe ** Weather Simulation requested, but no weather file attached. This series of error occurred after i updated Honeybee and Ladybug. Posted this on Github and was told it was a Legacy issue. If anyone has had this similar issue any help would be appropriated. The zip file with the file is attached also. Thank you

replies.body:
Put weather file to another location (Like "C:\Ladybug" or Energyplus weather folder ... ).

The file path of your weather file that you choose must be **without special characters** and **with no white space.**



best,

Omid
